title: Remember the Future
description: A compulsive gambler in debt to a Houston gangster, Grant Frederickson finds the words “TIME TO PAY” spray-painted on the walls of his apartment. But before he can confront the man he believes murdered his wife, he is dealt a wild card.Maddy is on the run herself and Grant is in the right place at the right time to protect her from the mysterious men who pursue her. But was their meeting truly accidental? Maddy seems to know more than she should—not just about Grant, but about the Future itself and where it will inevitably lead them: To New Orleans and Death.From the author of HALLOWED and THE MALL comes the fast-paced new thriller about dark fear, mortal courage and blind faith.
author: Bryant Delafosse
